ðŸ“– Summary: Jaaz is an open-source, privacy-focused multimodal creative assistant that functions as a local alternative to tools like Canva and Manus. It enables users to generate images and videos from single prompts, utilize a prompt-free 'Magic Canvas' for intuitive creation, and manage visual storyboards on an infinite canvas, all powered by a smart AI agent system.
